page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT OWERSBY
page.content: Of the 168 adults living within this block 98 are in full-time employment though only 1/3 of that number work within the area.Farming is still the largest employer with 36 people,the local duck industry coming 2nd. Other- wise there is a remarkably wide range of activities:-council workers,garage mechanics,lorry drivers,factory work- ers,the army,a merchant seaman,builder gardener,electrician,engineer & sales rep.with among the females:-shop and office workers,a teacher,hairdresser & nursing auxilliary. There is a certain amount of casual seasonal work such as potato picking,but lack of public tra- nsport and the costs of car ownership make travel to part time or low paid work uneconomic even when available. Despite these problems only about 12 people are unemployed and at least 2 of these have chosen early retirement.
